main event: Two female civilians reported seeing a silver flying disc over McKeesport, PA around July 3, 1948.
interesting points: The disc was described as being 12 to 15 inches in diameter., The object was said to be noiseless as it zoomed overhead., The witnesses followed the disc until it disappeared in a cloud bank., The sighting was reported to have occurred near Kennywood Park., The incident was treated with skepticism, suggesting it might have been ordinary aircraft reflecting sunlight.
